title: (Weds Part 1) Bobby Sees Larry David At Breakfast + Amy Hosting An Event for Adoptive Moms
itunes:title: (Weds Part 1) Bobby Sees Larry David At Breakfast + Amy Hosting An Event for Adoptive Moms
description:
Bobby shares a story about seeing Larry David (Creator of Seinfeld / Curb Your Enthusiasm) out at a breakfast place when he was in California over the weekend. He did something that he couldn’t believe! Amy is hosting an event for adoptive and foster moms tonight and gets some last minute advice from the show.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
